passages.text:
Disclaimer - This story is heavily inspired by a humorous song by Rob Cantor - Shia LaBeouf Live.
Rather than an enrichment of your cultural life, it serves more as Novint features showcase.

[[Start reading|start]]
passages.name: disclamer

passages.text:
He's following you, about 30 feet back
He gets down on all fours and breaks into a sprint
He's gaining on you
Shia LaBeouf
[[Run for your car|start_car]]
[[Stop and see what he wants|converse]]

links.name: Stop and see what he wants|converse
links.link: Stop and see what he wants|converse

passages.name: start_look

passages.text:
You dismiss the feeling of uneasiness creeping upon you. What's the worse that can happen. Suddenly you feel a blunt strike on the back of your head.
You collapse to the ground unconcious.
[[Continue|death_generic]]
passages.name: start_ignore

passages.text:
You're looking for you car but you're all turned around
He's almost upon you now
and you can see there's blood on his face
My God, there's blood everywhere!
[[See what he wants|converse]]
[[Start sprinting|start_sprint]]
passages.name: start_car

passages.text:
You wake up by a sublte, regular swinging motion. The whole of your body screams something's wrong. You open your eyes. You are hanging by your legs. You see an upside down smile of Shia LaBeouf as he's creeping towards you with an axe in his hand.
He raises the axe.
You think: "No, this can't be the end!"
But it is.
You die.

Game Over (Score: 0%)
passages.name: death_generic

passages.text:
You stop and turn around.
"What do you want?", you try to shout confidently, but the fear in your voice betrays you.
He says nothing. You can just see his blood-splattered face comes closer. He's holding something heavy in his hands.
Then all goes black.
[[Continue|death_generic]]
passages.name: converse

passages.text:
Running for you life (from Shia LaBeouf)
He's brandishing a knife (It's Shia LaBeouf)
Lurking in the shadows
Hollywood superstar Shia LaBeouf
[[Continue|forest]]
passages.name: start_sprint

passages.text:
Now it's dark and you seem to have lost him.
but you're hopelessly lost yourself.
Stranded with a murderer.
you creep silently through the underbrush.
[[Try to find a vantage point|vantage_point]]
[[Try to look for a way back|way_back]]

links.name: Try to find a vantage point|vantage_point
links.link: Try to find a vantage point|vantage_point

links.name: Try to look for a way back|way_back
links.link: Try to look for a way back|way_back

passages.name: forest

passages.text:
You climb a small slope to have a better overview.
Aha! In the distance
A small cottage with a light on
[[Move towards it|bear_trap]]
[[Try to find your way to the car|way_back]]

links.name: Try to find your way to the car|way_back
links.link: Try to find your way to the car|way_back

passages.name: vantage_point

passages.text:
You aimlessly walk through the woods, trying to find a way back to your car, but the forest seems to be thicker and thicker.
Suddenly, you hear a twig snapping behind you.
You turn around just to catch a glimplse of Shia LaBeouf swinging something heavy at you.
[[Continue|death_generic]]
passages.name: way_back

passages.text:
You can see a light from the cottage not far from you.
Hope! You move stealthily toward it
but your leg! Ah! It's caught in a bear trap!
[[Use your phone|trap_phone]]
[[Shout for help|trap_shout]]
[[Gnaw your leg off|trap_gnaw]]
passages.name: bear_trap

passages.text:
You power your phone on.
You call the cops.
They triangulate your position.
In an hour or so, you hear a dozen voices and see flickers of as many flashtorches.
You are rescued.
Shia LaBeouf escaped.

Game Over (Score: 50%)
passages.name: trap_phone

passages.text:
You didn't think it was a good idea to begin with, but something made you start shouting.
"Help! Help!"
In a minute you can hear steps behind you. Your body is in a awkward posture, it's difficult to turn your head.
But when you do, you see Shia LaBeouf with a smug grin on his face and club in his hand.
Then all goes black
[[Continue|death_generic]]
passages.name: trap_shout

passages.text:
Gnawing off your leg (Quiet, quiet)
Limping to the cottage (Quiet, quiet)
Now you're on the doorstep
Sitting inside: Shia LaBeouf
[[Sneak up behind him|cottage_sneak]]
[[Charge at him|cottage_charge]]
[[Turn around and try to find your car|way_back]]

links.name: Turn around and try to find your car|way_back
links.link: Turn around and try to find your car|way_back

passages.name: trap_gnaw

passages.text:
Sharpening an axe (Shia LaBeouf)
But he doesn't hear you enter (Shia LaBeouf)
You're sneaking up behind him
Strangling superstar Shia LaBeouf

To be continued...
passages.name: cottage_sneak

passages.text:
You let out a warcry as you charge at Shia LaBeouf, who up until now was blissfully unaware of your presence.
By making such a racket you gave him an opportunity to compose himself and prepare for your strike.
You notice a swift swing of his arm and some projectile flying towards you. You try to dodge, but it hits you. It barely does any damage, but when you lay your eyes upon it, you see it's a dart. You feel dizzy. Very dizzy.
You vision gets blurry.
Then - all goes black!
[[Continue|death_generic]]
passages.name: cottage_charge

passages.text:
You're walking in the woods
There's no one around and your phone is dead
Out of the corner of your eye you spot him:
Shia LaBeouf.
[[Look back|start_look]]
[[Ignore him|start_ignore]]
passages.name: start
